Searching for risks associated with drinking coffee.

Coffee has several health benefits including improved energy levels, enhanced brain function, and a lower risk of several diseases. Image of a steaming cup of coffee generated. However, excessive consumption can lead to insomnia, jitteriness, and increased heart rate.
